title: Siblings Cody and Alli Simpson step out together for the Australian Fashion Laureate in Sydney
text:
Cody and Alli Simpson reunited in Sydney on Wednesday for the Australian Fashion Laureate.

The siblings happily posed for photos alongside one another ahead of the event, which recognises excellence in the Australian fashion industry.

Now based in Los Angeles, Cody's visited coincided with the 22-year-old singer's unveiling as the Robot on The Masked Singer.

Back together: Cody and Alli Simpson reunited in Sydney on Wednesday for the Australian Fashion Laureate

Meanwhile, Alli, 21, traded her LA home base for Sydney late last year.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at the Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day earlier this month, Alli confirmed her brother's relationship with Miley Cyrus.

'They're very happy and very in love,' she said at the time.

Keeping it in the family: The siblings happily posed for photos alongside one another ahead of the event, which recognises excellence in the Australian fashion industry

Young love: Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at the Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day earlier this month, Alli confirmed her brother's relationship with Miley Cyrus (pictured)

She added: 'It's very new, but they have history and they're posting about each other a lot.'

The Instagram influencer looked chic in a black mini dress, which featured ruching on the skirt.

It also featured long sleeves and a high neckline, and she paired it with a pair of strappy black stilettos.

Back to black: The Instagram influencer looked chic in a black mini-dress, which featured ruching on the skirt

Blonde ambition: Her long blonde hair was worn parted in the middle and tucked behind her ears, and it sat sleek down her back

Her long blonde hair was worn parted in the middle and tucked behind her ears, and it sat sleek down her back.

Alli accessorised simply with a variety of rings, and wore a pair of dangly cross earrings.

She opted for soft pink lips and wore lashings of mascara, drawing attention to her blue eyes.

Hell for leather: Meanwhile, Cody opted for a decidedly more casual look, stepping out in black leather-look tapered leg jeans

Keeping it casual: He also wore a white sweatshirt printed with logos, and donned a black beanie over his blonde hair

Unmasked: Now based in Los Angeles, Cody's visited coincided with the 22-year-old singer's unveiling as the Robot on The Masked Singer

Meanwhile, Cody opted for a decidedly more casual look, stepping out in black leather-look tapered leg jeans.

He also wore a white sweatshirt printed with logos, and donned a black beanie over his blonde hair.

The Golden Thing singer accessorised with chunky silver chain necklaces, and wore black slip-on sneakers patterned with skeleton feet.

Best friends: In an August 2018 interview with The Daily Telegraph's Stellar Magazine , Alli revealed she and her brother share a close relationship

In an August 2018 interview with The Daily Telegraph's Stellar Magazine, Alli revealed she and her brother share a close relationship.

'Cody and I are really close,' she told the publication.

'I couldn't tell you one time we've ever had an argument. For me, there was no jealousy, or feeling like I was in his shadow. I'm proud to be his sister.'
description: Cody and Alli Simpson reunited in Sydney on Wednesday for the Australian Fashion Laureate. The siblings happily posed for photos alongside one another ahead of the event.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
